div.p: You attended an event. Write an article for your blog.

If you want to meet new people, have a good time with your friends or drink a beer with us, you have to come to the AfterKot's GREAT SUNRISE OPENING. You can note on your agenda or on your calendar that this will take place the 30th June on the Sciences' Place, 1340 LLN.

You can come with your girlfriend/boyfriend because we organize a moment for couples ! At 5 pm, you will play a game with your girlfriend/boyrfriend, and the winner will won a city trip to Roma ! For the people who doesn't have a girlfriend/boyfriend, no stress : in parallel we have an other game to win an Iphone 6S !
We hope that you will come !
